price: Gaaddiseessaa miti; boba'aa ibiddaa irraas hin duroomsu.
arabic: لَّا ظَلِيلٖ وَلَا يُغۡنِي مِنَ ٱللَّهَبِ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: lā ẓalīlin walā yugh'nī mina al-lahabi
